import numpy as np # linear algebra
import pandas as pd # data processing, CSV file I/O (e.g. pd.read_csv)

# Input data files are available in the read-only "../input/" directory
# For example, running this (by clicking run or pressing Shift+Enter) will list all files under the input directory

import os
for dirname, _, filenames in os.walk('/kaggle/input'):
    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

source.4911b35c:
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
source.bbb2a703:
gamesales[gamesales.Year>2010].Platform.value_counts().sort_values().plot(kind='barh',figsize=(10,6))
plt.title('Number of release on each platform')
plt.xlabel('Count')
plt.ylabel('Platform')
source.06b2e13a:
gamesales.apply(platform_to_company,axis='columns').groupby('Platform').Global_Sales.count().sort_values().plot(kind='pie',figsize=(8,8))
plt.title('Number of Games on a Companies Platform')
plt.ylabel('')
source.73f6f5e3:
gamesales.groupby('Year').Name.count().sort_values(ascending=False).head(7).plot(kind='bar',figsize=(10,7))
plt.title('Game sales by year')
plt.ylabel('Sales (in millions)')
source.c37406f5:
gamesales.Genre.value_counts().sort_values().plot(kind='barh',figsize=(10,6))
plt.title('Total number of games by genre')
plt.xlabel('Number of units(count)')
plt.ylabel('Genre')
source.a063027d:
gamesales.groupby('Genre').Global_Sales.sum().sort_values().plot(kind='barh',figsize=(10,6))
plt.title('Global sales by Genre')
plt.xlabel('Sales (in millions)')
source.51fffc70:
gamesales.groupby('Genre').NA_Sales.sum().sort_values().plot(kind='barh',figsize=(10,6))
plt.title('Naorth American Sales by Genre')
plt.xlabel('Sales (in millions)')

plt.title('Europe sales by Genre')
plt.xlabel('Sales (in millions)')

plt.xlabel('Sales (in millions)')
source.a9c7c5c3:
gamesales[gamesales.Year>2010].groupby('Publisher').Global_Sales.sum().sort_values().tail(10).plot(kind='barh',figsize=(10,7))
plt.title('Most sales in last Decade (World)')
plt.xlabel('Sales (in millions)')

source.b3d68775:
gamesales[gamesales.Publisher=='Electronic Arts'].groupby('Genre').Global_Sales.sum().sort_values().plot(kind='barh',figsize=(10,6))
plt.title('Global Sales by Electronic Arts')
plt.xlabel('Sales (in millions)')
source.4e32d309:
gamesales[gamesales.Publisher=='Activision'].groupby('Genre').NA_Sales.sum().sort_values().plot(kind='barh').plot(kind='barh',figsize=(10,6))
plt.title('North America Sales By Activision')
plt.xlabel('Sales (in millions)')
source.4e28ffb7:
gamesales[gamesales.Publisher=='Nintendo'].groupby('Genre').JP_Sales.sum().sort_values().plot(kind='barh',figsize=(10,6),grid=True)
plt.title('Nintendo Sales in Japan')
plt.xlabel('Sales (in millions)')
